attributes.action: lower duty on petrol and diesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
are you fed up of the goverment always stumping the motorists for everything. such as petrol and diesel we all need for day to day life, they stop us using our  mobile phones, costing us (joe public) money for handsfree kits and fining us if we're caught using without. fining us for speeding and any other little thing they can, just to squeeze more money out of the motorist. we all pay tax time and time again on are wages is there going to be a point where we will actually see any of our money we work so hard for.

please sign and make the goverment sort this out and stop being greedy and making more ways to get our money.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
